metadata.name: !Reaction_port_pack
metadata.description:
[b]This pack depends on [url=]ReactionAPI[/url] in order to function, and cannot display reactions on it's own. Be sure to enable both![/b]
Reaction Port Pack is a package of well-known Reaction to Quality Items mods, but the quality detection system is powered by [b]ReactionAPI[/b], which improves on some issues found within the older mods.
[u]Included Mods[/u] [list] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2798746733]Ugh for Bad Items: High Effort[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2612456876]Not Mad, Just Disappointed for Quality 0 Items[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2490515687]POG for Good Items[/url] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2575911103]Specialist Dance for Good Items[/url] [/list]
It also adds a new Reaction for Quality 0 based off of [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2815404414]the lost pain scale[/url] and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2702605985]Traumatized Mr. Incredible for bad items[/url]
This mod also works as an [b]API[/b] that allows mod creators to add their Costumes, Music and Sounds to a library that the user can then choose from, when customizing each reaction. Check [u]reactionpack_scripts\api\interface.lua[/u] for more Info on how to implement Packages.
